front.title: User-based Security Model (USM) for version 3 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv3)
front.abstract: This document describes the User-based Security Model (USM) for SNMP version 3 for use in the SNMP architecture. It defines the Elements of Procedure for providing SNMP message level security. This document also includes a MIB for remotely monitoring/managing the configuration parameters for this Security Model. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
